name: Bangla Contact Form
author: Cx Rana

sections.description:
Bangla Contact Form” Creative Bangla Contact Form with attachment support and also include Empty Form validation.
after installation then go to your Plugin Editor and findout ‘ahrnetwork@gmail.com’ and replace it.
Now go to addnew page>create new pages>paste this code [contact_form]

Credits

  • Powered by Bangladesh Web Lab
    Updated for WordPress 3.3.1

Features:
* Simple Contact sytems for Your WordPress Blog
* Bangla(Unicode)Form
* Empty Form Javascripts validation

Plugin by Cx Rana. Need a Web Designer?

License

sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
  3. Go to your plugin editor and find ‘ahrnetwork@gmail.com’,now replace this email
  4. Now create a new pages and paste this code [contact_form]
sections.faq:
How does it work?

It creates a Contact page in your blog under which some config.

What if I don’t show form, how do I code this to appear in the Contact Page?

Just put this code contact page in your addnew page,

[contact_form]

How can I Replace contact form destination e-mail ?

Now Go To plugin editor and find ‘ahrnetwork@gmail.com’ Please replace this e mail address.

Can I suggest an feature for the plugin?

Of course, visit Bangla Contact Form Home Page

I like your work, are you available for hire?

Yes I am, visit my Cx Rana’s Official Page page to find out more.
